summary: Plan an app focused on a single YouTube-related feature (embedding YouTube videos with custom playback controls).

existing_features.title: Create a single-page UI that lets the user paste a YouTube URL (or video ID), validates/parses it into a videoId, and embeds the video in the page.
Implement custom playback controls that control the embedded YouTube player (Play, Pause, Seek -10s, Seek +10s, Mute/Unmute, Volume slider, Playback speed selector).
Add a minimal, coherent visual theme for the app and apply it consistently (layout, colors, typography, components), without introducing additional product features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a simple app focused on a YouTube feature: embed YouTube videos and provide custom playback control buttons.

projectName: YouTube Embed Player with Custom Playback Controls
